sense.def:
Abuse
so nevljudne in neprijazne besede, ki jih človek izreče v jezi.

seg.quote: The girls shrieked abuse at the lawyers.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
abuses someone
tistemu človeku govori nevljudne ali neprijazne besede ali z njim ravna kruto ali nasilno.

seg.quote: He did not like to hear Elaine abused or criticized.
The patients were often physically abused.

sense.def:
Abuse of someone
je kruto ali nasilno ravnanje z nekim človekom.

seg.quote: ...found guilty of gross neglect and abuse.

sense.def:
To abuse something
pomeni nekaj uporabljati narobe ali s slabim namenom.

Abuse of something
je nepravilna raba ali uporaba nečesa v slabe namene.
